title: Group Therapy: Should He Talk to His Son About Being Gay?
description: Todd calls in to tell us that he's pretty sure his son is gay and is wondering if he should approach him about it or wait for his son to talk to him about it.
itunes:summary: Todd calls in to tell us that he's pretty sure his son is gay and is wondering if he should approach him about it or wait for his son to talk to him about it.
